description:
**The most powerful studying app for webOS just got better, on the HP Touchpad.**
With the ability to keep track of tests, edit terms, set statistics, and the most powerful learning mode on webOS, you'll never need to open another app. Study Buddy HD is the only app you'll need to keep a perfect 4.0 GPA, or just learn some new facts to impress your friends. With exhibition mode, you can study while your device is locked!

Have a test in a few days? Brush up on your classwork using the learn mode, the most powerful teaching mode there is. Instead of just guessing, use your brain to type in the correct answer, giving you better memory retention. Or just get familiar with the terms with the easy to use familiarize mode.  Study Buddy HD is redesigned specifically for the Touchpad, with new features and a redesigned learn mode! 
Bring all the power of Quizlet with you wherever you go with Study Buddy HD! Designed for Quizlet users by Quizlet users, it has all the power of Quizlet, with a design that’s made specifically for webOS and the Touchpad. With Study Buddy HD, you can utilize both the familiarize & learn modes of Quizlet. Get to know your terms quickly with a simple, streamlined interface! Quizlet is the largest flashcard database on the internet, allowing you to study anything you want, whether you're a student preparing for a history test or you want to refresh yourself on the states. It’s your choice. 

With a tablet this powerful, you shouldn’t have to compromise on the way you learn, & with Study Buddy HD, you don't have to! Logo designed by Rhyne Media. Check him out, he really does do great work, and I can't thank him enough for the great work he did on mine and other webOS logos.
